snippet.title: God's Trigger - Accolades Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy the game: https://godstriggergame.com/

God’s Trigger Descended From the Heavens in a Shower of Blood on April 18, 2019.
And it made you destroy everything in your path as quickly and stylishly as possible to stop the apocalypse, using combos, customizable special abilities, and environmental traps to your advantage.

Watch the video and check what others have to say about the game. 

God’s Trigger available digitally for PC, the Xbox One family of devices, including Xbox One X, and PlayStation 4.

Steam - http://bit.ly/Gods_Trigger_Steam
Website - http://bit.ly/Gods_Trigger_WebsiteRT
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/omlgames
Twitter - https://twitter.com/oml_games
